name: Opportunity:Bullet-Hell-Shielder
description:
"Opportunity: Bullet Hell Shielder" is a prequel to our first game, FlameShield.

In this game you dodge and weave to raise your score but as you move to survive, your tool for protection leaves you until you stop again. Decide quickly what opportunities to take and which to leave behind.

The game gets ever difficult because no, its not a bug, the diamond attackers cannot be eliminated.
